means: （使）降低， （使）跌落（ lower的过去式和过去分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: She gave him a quick, upward look, then lowered her eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她抬眼迅速瞥了他一下，然后眼睛又垂了下去。

sentence.Network_en: She lowered her gaze to the hands in her lap.
sentence.Network_cn: 她低头盯着放在大腿上的双手。

sentence.Network_en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 海平面下降使白令海底部的浅层大陆架暴露出来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1997到2002年间，中国政府降低了（lowered）官方的农村贫困线--给最贫困的人获得非常基本的援助的资格--三次，与公务员的四次 …
the hull is carefully lowered onto the keel ., 船体正在认真下调到龙骨.
The bride comes into the room with lowered eyes and with everyone staring at her ., 新娘低垂双眼在大家的直视下走进了房间.
a borrower delays redemption of principal under the terms a new repayment schedule . interest continues to be paid andinterest can be raised or lowered .指借款人按新的偿还计划延期赎还本金，但需继续支付利息，可以调高或调低利率。

list.abs: berth的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... loading berth 装船泊位 lower berth 下铺 open berth 开放锚位.
英语课程级别介绍 - 韦博国际英语 ... - 进阶 Beginner - 中级 Lower Intermediate - 中高级 Intermediate.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... lower bound 下界 lower limit 下限 lower quartile 下四分位数.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... loss per cent 赔率；亏蚀百分率 lower bound 下界 lower limit 下限.

entry.def: You can use lower to refer to the bottom one of a pair of things.
You can use lower to refer to the bottom part of something.

example.ex: Use a small cushion to help give support to the lower back.
example.tran: 用一个小靠垫帮助支撑腰部。

example.ex: ...fires which started in the lower part of a tower block.
example.tran: 从塔楼底部开始烧起的大火

entry.def: You can use lower to refer to people or things that are less important than similar people or things.

example.ex: Already the awards are causing resentment in the lower ranks of council officers...
example.tran: 奖项已使政务委员会的低层官员们愤愤不平。

example.ex: The nation's  highest court reversed the lower court's  decision...
example.tran: 该国最高法院已推翻了下级法院的判决。

entry.def: If you lower something, you move it slowly downwards.

example.ex: Two reporters had to help lower the coffin into the grave...
example.tran: 两名记者不得不帮忙把灵柩慢慢地放进墓穴中。

example.ex: Sokolowski lowered himself into the black leather chair...
example.tran: 索科洛夫斯基缓缓地坐到黑色皮椅上。

entry.def: If you lower something, you make it less in amount, degree, value, or quality.

example.ex: The Central Bank has lowered interest rates by 2 percent...
example.tran: 中央银行已将利率调低了两个百分点。

example.ex: This drug lowers cholesterol levels by binding fats in the intestine.
example.tran: 这种药通过黏合肠内的脂肪降低胆固醇水平。

entry.def: If someone lowers their head or eyes, they look downwards, for example because they are sad or embarrassed.

example.ex: She lowered her head and brushed past photographers as she went back inside...
example.tran: 她再次回到里面时低着头，与摄影师擦身而过。

example.ex: She lowered her gaze to the hands in her lap.
example.tran: 她低头盯着放在大腿上的双手。

entry.def: If you say that you would not lower yourself by doing something, you mean that you would not behave in a way that would make you or other people respect you less.

example.ex: Don't lower yourself, don't be the way they are...
example.tran: 不要自贬身份,不要学他们那样。

example.ex: I've got no qualms about lowering myself to Lemmer's level to get what I want.
example.tran: 为得到我想要的东西，我一点都不忌讳把自己降格到跟莱麦尔一样。

entry.def: If you lower your voice or if your voice lowers, you speak more quietly.

example.ex: The man moved closer, lowering his voice...
example.tran: 那个男子靠上前去，压低了声音。

means.word_mean: 1. below the surround or below the normal position;

auth_sentence.content: He sits in a wheelchair, his face lowered.
auth_sentence.res_content: He sits in a wheelchair, his face lowered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He sits in a wheelchair, his face lowered.

auth_sentence.content: It states that such research lowered automobile deaths dramatically.
auth_sentence.res_content: It states that such research lowered automobile deaths dramatically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It states that such research lowered automobile deaths dramatically.

auth_sentence.content: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.
auth_sentence.res_content: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The world will endure more generations of lowered potential.

Sentence.sentence: The platform is lowered into the garage, and it is then transported to a vacant parking space by a computer-controlled device similar to an elevator that also runs sideways.
Eroding religious belief in Europe may partly explain lowered birthrates.
